question: My father is now 56 years old.He has had diabetes since more than 20 years.He also has high blood pressure.Recently his creatinine levels have gone upto2.7What can be done about the same?Any dietary changes or anything else that would help to bring it under control?Also he is starting to have eyesight related problems.Is it normal after so many years of being a diabetic???please help me out.Thank you.Shivangi.
title: How to control creatinie levels???
